parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>game2</name>=<value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name>version2</name>=<value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Turrets

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Adds a weapon to the turret. Use turret path [-1] for driver's turret.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[addWeaponTurret]] [weaponName, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> [weaponName, turretPath]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> weaponName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_tank [[addWeaponTurret]] ["LMG_M200", [0,0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeWeaponTurret]], [[turretLocal]], [[addMagazineTurret]], [[magazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazinesTurret]], [[removeMagazineTurret]], [[weaponsTurret]], [[currentMagazineDetailTurret]], [[currentMagazineTurret]], [[currentWeaponTurret]], [[selectWeaponTurret]]
</value></part></template></root>
